message.name: ERR_PLAN_GROUP_XFV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: You cannot add this plan group, as a plan group of this name has already been added to this service plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_CREATE_PLAN_GROUP_FOR_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: You cannot create a plan group for a canceled plan template.
You cannot create a plan group for a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_MODIFY_PLAN_GROUP_FOR_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: You cannot modify a plan group for a canceled plan template.
You cannot modify a plan group for a cancelled plan template.

message.name: ERR_PT_PLANGROUP_DELETE_FROM_CANCELED_TEMPLATE
message.locale: The plan template plan group cannot be deleted from a canceled plan template.
The plan template plan group cannot be deleted from a cancelled plan template.
